name: IT HURTS DAD
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS SPOOKY SCENES!

*STORY:

Your child died of cancer at a very young age. Because of it, he now can't enjoy living his young and short life anymore. You as his father feel guilt . You somehow want to bring your son back to life, but you know it's impossible. Then you remember the lab you used to work at. All the research and contributions that you were a part, all these years of research cannot be wasted now. This is your last chance at being happy. Bring him back to life.

* CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACE BAR - FLASH LIGHT

Z, SHIFT - RUN

*OBJECTIVE:

Collect all of the parts to get the machine running.
